results.description: England contender Dom Sibley hits a superb 215 not out in Warwickshire's 488 all out before they reduce Notts to 105-5.

thumbnail.altText: Dom Sibley still holds the record for the highest score in English cricket this summer, his 244 against Kent at Canterbury in June
